body:
We have a self-hosted cluster deployed with server ver. 1.27.2. After enabling Nexus we could not get the workflow to start in the target namespace.

Upon further inspection we found that `/temporal.api.nexusservice.v1.NexusService/DispatchByEndpoint` is executed which is not listed in [metadata.go](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/v1.27.2/common/api/metadata.go). We rely on the Method Metadata and the functions defined in that file for our custom authorizer but since the DispatchByEndpoint is not part of any of the listings it was failing. DispatchByEndpoint seems crucial as it dispatches the request to the Endpoint I believe. 

Is this intentional, shouldn't they be part of the metadata file such as the DispatchNexusTask, PollNexusTaskQueue etc. apis?

comments.body: Thank you for reporting the issue. We working on fix this: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/7630

title: Nexus APIs not listed in api metdata file
